    CV

    You can find my resume here (last update 02/2026).

    Short resume

    • Since 2024: Post-doctoral fellow, INRIA Saclay
    • 2020–2023: PhD candidate (CIFRE), Institut Montpelliérain Alexander Grothendieck (IMAG, Université de Montpellier, CNRS) & Spin Up
    • 2019: Research engineer, Institut Montpelliérain Alexander Grothendieck (IMAG, Université de Montpellier, CNRS)
    • 2014–2019: Engineering curriculum at Ecole Centrale de Marseille (ECM)
      • 2017–2019: Master in Biomedical Engineering, Technical University of Denmark (DTU), Copenhagen – Double-degree with ECM
      • 2016–2017: Gap year
        • Spring 2017: 3-month volunteering in Vietnam
        • Fall 2016: 6-month internship at Julius Wolff Institut (JWI), La Charité, Berlin
        • /
      • 2014–2016: Engineering student, ECM
        • Summer 2016: 4-month internship at Institut des Sciences du Mouvement (ISM), Aix-Marseille Université
        • Spring 2016: Semester in Bioengineering
    • 2012–2014: Classes préparatoires aux Grandes Écoles (CPGE – MPSI/PSI), Lycée Chateaubriand, Rennes
      Intensive preparatory course in mathematics and physics to enter French engineering schools
    • 2012: Scientific Baccalauréat & Abitur, Lycée Chateaubriand, Rennes

    PhD awards

    • Société de Biomécanique PhD award 2024
    • Société Française de Résonance Magnétique en Biologie et Médecine (SFRMBM) PhD award 2023
